edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image.io

Class PromptingImageReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image.io.ImageReader
      • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image.io.PromptingImageReader

  • public class PromptingImageReader
extends ImageReader
    A type of ImageReader that has the conventional functionality, but also adds the ability to prompt a user with a file chooser dialog to get a file to read.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.image.io.ImageReader

    • Method Detail

      • promptingRead

        public Image promptingRead()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Reads an Image from a location on disk. A file chooser dialog will appear and ask the user to select the Image to read.
        Returns:
        the Image read from disk, or null if the user failed to select an Image.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a problem reading the Image.
